00029 class simbio_security
00030 {
00037     public static function doCheckHttps($int_https_port)
00038     {
00039         $server_https_port = $_SERVER['SERVER_PORT'];
00040         if ($server_https_port != $int_https_port) {
00041             $host =  $_SERVER['SERVER_NAME'];
00042             $https_url = 'https://'.$host.$_SERVER['PHP_SELF'];
00043             // send HTTP header
00044             header("location: $https_url");
00045         }
00046     }
00047 
00048 
00056     public static function destroySessionCookie($str_msg, $str_session_name = '', $str_cookie_path = '/', $bool_die = false)
00057     {
00058         if (!$str_session_name) { $str_session_name = session_name(); }
00059         // deleting session browser cookie
00060         @setcookie($str_session_name, '', time()-86400, $str_cookie_path);
00061         // destroy all session
00062         unset($_SESSION);
00063         session_destroy();
00064         if ($bool_die === true) {
00065             // shutdown current script
00066             die($str_msg);
00067         } else {
00068             if ($str_msg) { echo $str_msg; }
00069         }
00070     }
00071 }
00072 ?>
